title: Janna buff / rework?
body:
So I decided to play some Janna support in ranked. I haven't played her in such a long time although she is my favourite support.

When i played her she felt very weak compared to other supports, i understand how janna's play style is but when i play but i like to auto / dmg when i can on any support. When poking with janna i normally e myself and auto / w to get dmg off and block any autos back from enemy side. Janna is a good support but i feel like Karma, Lulu, Soraka and Sona do her job a lot better. So i thought of some changes or buffs to give janna to help her out but not completely rework the champion.

Passive - Maybe lock onto a champion where you both get movement speed when walking towards each other (like zekes harbinger lock on how you can swap after anytime given the cooldown)

Q - Lowering the mana cost from 90-105-120-135 to 80-95-120-130 help early game (i think i got numbers correctly)

W - have the same passive of movement speed and going through units but change the attack part to ..when using w on enemy slowing the target (putting the little cloud bird on enemy) when hit by allies it explodes doing a little bit of aoe dmg for x amount. 


E - i think it's fine

R - maybe increase the healing and lower the cooldown 

Thats what i thought when playing janna, i feel like she will get a rework but i want her to feel the same and not get ruined by her changing her completely.

Thanks would appreciate any feed back lol

replies.body: Make it so her ult doesn't heal at 1s intervals. Make it similar to Singed thingy. Nerf her base stuff but buff her ratios. Specifically her W passive.

She's the strongest support in the game right now - she definitely doesn't need buffs at all.

She is weak early, strong af late.
